A dramatic scene unfolds in a richly decorated, vintage-style room with deep red walls and portrait adornments, as two actors engage intensely while another looks on from a staircase.
A scene from "Angel Street," designed by Brandon PT Davis, featuring Victorian-era costumes and dark wood paneled walls.

Scenic design for 'Parliament Square' by Brandon PT Davis features a circular brick-patterned floor and projected family photos.

Scenic design for 'Parliament Square' by Brandon PT Davis features a circular brick pattern on the floor with warm lighting and a backdrop projection.
Two actors perform on a dark tiled floor, part of 'Parliament Square' scenic design by Brandon PT Davis. The stage features a subtle circular pattern.

Scenic design for "Parliament Square" by Brandon PT Davis features a dark stage with red neon accents and a large projection of fire above.
Stage set with office desks, filing cabinet, and a large abstract window backdrop on a theatre stage.

Scenic design for "The Pajama Game" by Brandon PT Davis features a large clock backdrop in a factory setting with work tables and chairs.
The Pajama Game, designed by Brandon PT Davis, features dancers in colorful 1950s attire on a stage with vibrant blue backdrop and stylized tree cutouts.
The Pajama Game at an unidentified venue, designed by Brandon PT Davis. Scene shows five actors around a retro table in a cozy room.
Theatrical set with two actors in colorful hats, a painted box, angular structures, and atmospheric lighting.
In 'Romero (Scenic Design) - Design by Brandon PT Davis', intimate lighting and textured backgrounds create a moody atmosphere.
The set of 'Romero' features striking geometric forms in warm hues, enhancing a dramatic atmosphere with intense spatial dynamics.
The scenic design for 'Romero' envelops characters in warm, dramatic lighting, enhancing the textured realism of the setting.
The set for 'Romero' features geometric stone platforms beneath a backdrop of industrial pillars, accentuated by dramatic shadows.
The set for 'Romero' features a commanding oversized human figure with stylized hands, enriched by deep shadows and dramatic lighting.
Theatrical stage set with musical instruments, vintage photographs, and a retro diner theme.

The set for 'Million Dollar Quartet' showcases a rich wooden piano against a deep red floor, contrasted by neon blue light accents.
The set for 'Million Dollar Quartet' features vibrant neon signage with brick walls and warm lighting highlighting the vintage decor.

The set for 'Million Dollar Quartet' features vivid red and gold elements with a retro SUN sign backdrop, enhanced by warm, dynamic lighting.
The set for 'Million Dollar Quartet' features a sleek retro recording studio with rich mahogany panels, under soft amber lighting.
Dramatic interior stage set with a chandelier, large windows, and vintage furniture in dim lighting.

A rich, immersive scenic design featuring a vibrant shadow projection of a figure on a library backdrop. The warm, ambient lighting casts dramatic contrasts, evoking a sense of mystery and narrative depth.

An immersive scenic design transforms the stage into an enchanted library. Rich, colorful lighting highlights the actors, while intricate bookshelves and symbolic projections create a whimsical atmosphere, perfect for storytelling. This blend of set design and lighting enhances the narrative depth.

A vibrant pop-up storybook set dominates the stage, bathed in warm, inviting lights. Actors bring the whimsical landscape to life amidst a library setting, with rich, earthy tones and a playful interaction that evokes a sense of childlike wonder.
A serene stage composition featuring actors in intimate repose, enhanced by deep blue lighting and a minimalist set design with subtle period details.

A captivating scenic design featuring a library setting with towering bookshelves, a projected moon, and expressive blue lighting. The composition frames two actors, highlighting their dynamic in an intimate, surreal atmosphere.

An evocative theatre scene with towering bookshelves framing a central projection of a shadowy figure. Warm, dramatic lighting intensifies the mystery, as a lone actor is seated on stage, absorbed in the ambiance.
Interior of Red Line Café, featuring red accents, wooden beams, and black metal railings with mixed seating arrangements.
